entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • stack dump in VS from ValidateAssembliesTask on input not found #33396
  • NETSDK1139 should suggest enabling the workload resolver when disabled #33395
  • ppc64le crash MSB0001: Internal MSBuild Error: Cannot acquire required number of nodes. #33378

Closed

  • Disclosed vulnerability in dotnet 6.0: GHSA-5crp-9r3c-p9vr (Newtonsoft.Json) #31382

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a unique error message when workloads are disabled but a customer is trying to use workloads #33406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to Svc Pool #33405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #33400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33398
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #33397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.120 #33390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.315 #33391
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.412 #33392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.109 #33393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.306 #33394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add review comment to sb files #32966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2204896 #33303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sequester UseArtifactsOutput logic in its own file #33310
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • Fix Source Link cross-targeting targets #33292
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix workload cache security descriptors #33322
    untriaged
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
